<Text: West Street District:  The two buildings at 148-150 Tremont Street were once occupied by Chandler and Company, an exclusive department store.>

<Text: West Street District:  Number 148 is a Renaissance Revival structure built as an office building in 1912, and number 150 was built in 1903 to house the Oliver Ditson Company, a music publisher.>

<Text: West Street District:  The Schraffts Building at 16-24 West Street was built in 1922, and housed a flagship candy store and restaurant for more than fifty years.>
